meaning_str.bing:
n. 习惯；习性；惯常行为；（吸毒、喝酒、抽烟的）瘾
v. 装扮；〈古〉住在
网络. 脾性；嗜好；个人习惯

习惯；习性；惯常行为；（吸毒、喝酒、抽烟的）瘾

习惯；习性；常规；惯常行为；嗜好；癖好；（吸毒、喝酒、抽烟的）瘾；成瘾；（尤指修女的）服饰；长袍
使穿上；给…穿衣（尤指宗教或正式场合的服装）；打扮

1.en: Inspire: Make it a daily habit to read or listen to something positive or inspirational . Keep it with you and listen to it regularly.
1.cn: 激励：每天朗读或记着一些积极或激励的文章！让这成为习惯。持续的专注及焦点就是决定未来发生的道路！

2.en: Often we'll start a habit change, and within a week or two change our focus to something else.
2.cn: 当我们开始改变习惯时，通常在一至两个礼拜之内就会将注意力转移至他处。

3.en: Make it a habit so your weekends aren't spent doing tons of laundry. This takes self discipline.
3.cn: 养成习惯，到了周末，你就不用把时间耗在洗衣服上了。

0.en: Wow. Pretty girl. Bad habit. Don't quote me. All right?
0.cn: 先生……漂亮姑娘，坏习惯，别引用这句，好吗？

1.en: Honey? It's a filthy, disgusting habit and I want you to quit now.
1.cn: 亲爱的这是个坏习惯，我要你马上戒烟。

2.en: What are you implying? I'm implying that you're a creature of habit.
2.cn: 你这是什么意思？我在说你是一个有生活习惯的人。

3.en: I hope you don't make a habit of it, but the drama club can always use an extra hand.
3.cn: 希望你们别养成习惯，但是戏剧社一向欢迎帮手加入。

4.en: And you've made your initial decision into a stream of decisions and into a habit.
4.cn: 你最初的那个决定影响了此后你一连串的决定，最终它成为你的一个习惯。

5.en: You know, you can just hang it up by pressing the button on the side. You don't have to decline. I'm a creature of habit.
5.cn: 你按边上的按钮就可以直接挂断。你不用拒接。我习惯了。

6.en: I hate eating alone. So do I. You know, you don't actually have to keep doing that. Oh, force of habit.
6.cn: 我不喜欢一个人吃东西。我也是。你知道的，你不必一直加班。噢，已经习惯了。

7.en: And develop an insane Pilates habit, and buy a dog, or a horse, and develop a crush on your riding instructor.
7.cn: 然后逐渐养成疯狂做普拉提的习惯，买条狗或一匹马，然后看上了骑术教练。

8.en: Asking for feedback is a really important habit to get into as you leave the structure of the school calendar and exams and grades behind.
8.cn: 养成寻求反馈的习惯是非常重要的。特别是在离开学校系统 没了考试和分数之后。

9.en: Well, your father, he's good. He doesn't have vices. You know what a vice is? A vice is like a bad habit, like biting your nails, but worse.
9.cn: 你们的爸爸很优秀，没有恶习。你们明白恶习是什么吗？恶习是种坏习惯，比如咬指甲，但是更严重。

10.en: I'll take this one too. Mommy? Oh, I've gotten into the habit of calling Rachel Mommy when we're around Emma. Which I now realize we are not.
10.cn: 这个也让我来。什么“妈咪”啊？喔，我已经习惯叫瑞秋“妈咪”，只要是艾玛在场。我现在发现她并不在。

11.en: Okay. So, growing up, I used to watch the Steelers with my dad. Right? Every single Sunday, until I grew up and I moved out here and I just got out of the habit.
11.cn: 从小到大，我总和我爸一起看匹兹堡钢人队的比赛。每个周末，直到我长大了，搬来这里，就没了这个习惯。

12.en: You have the habit of burying people before they are dead.
12.cn: 你一向喜欢把未死之人送进坟墓。

13.en: Very well. Top test scores in class. Highest Battle Room ratings. But you have a habit of upsetting your commander.
13.cn: 非常好，考试成绩名列前茅，战斗得分也是第一，但你好像总是惹你的长官生气。
